Hi, I'm Alex, a technical writer with three years of experience in software, two in architecture, and many more in education and journalism. After some time away, I'm ready to return to my roots in tech. Thanks for visiting, and please enjoy my portfolio samples below.

Portfolio

  • Transferring Data Over a Network

    A landing topic for navigating the various network transfer protocols in LabVIEW

  • Publishing Latest Values with Shared Variables

    Once upon a time, the documentation for LabVIEW's shared variable API was a mess. This is the story of how I cleaned it up, at least for a while.

  • Streaming Data between Applications

    A multimodal approach to LabVIEW documentation, featuring numbered callouts that describe dataflow in an application

  • Network Streams API

    The doc set for LabVIEW's Network Streams API

  • Real-Time Hypervisor Quick Start Guide

    A quick start PDF for a bare metal embedded system, including Linux installation instructions

  • Transferring Data between Operating Systems

    When there's more than one way to complete the same task, users need to know the pros and cons of each method.
